title: External Secrets Operator
description: Sync secrets from external stores (HashiCorp Vault, AWS Secrets Manager, Azure Key Vault, GCP Secret Manager). Runs in all-namespaces mode via openshift-operators. Specify {} for all defaults.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Set false to skip external-secrets installation.

approval.title: Install Plan Approval
approval.description: InstallPlan approval strategy. Automatic installs updates immediately; Manual requires admin approval.

source.title: Catalog Source
source.description: OLM CatalogSource name. Override for disconnected or custom catalogs.

vault.title: Vault Backend
vault.description: Configure a ClusterSecretStore backed by HashiCorp Vault or OpenBao with Kubernetes auth.

server.description: Vault server URL. Use in-cluster service for co-located Vault.

path.description: KV v2 secrets engine mount path.

serviceAccount.description: Service account name for Kubernetes auth.
